content: alexcrichton requested dicej for a review on PR #10085.

alexcrichton opened PR #10085 from alexcrichton:quadratic to bytecodealliance:main:

While I don't think this would have solved #10084 because it's not really anywhere you'd look once having such a problem I figure it's not harmful to mention this in the docs at least.
